names.name: Yah
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Chokhmah, representing the dynamic, expansive force of creation.

names.name: Raziel
names.description: Known as the 'Secret of God', the angel associated with mystery and the concealed aspects of the divine.

names.name: Auphanim
names.description: The order of angels associated with Chokhmah, symbolizing the primordial energies of the cosmos in constant motion.

names.name: Zodiac
names.description: Represents the cosmic cycles and the celestial influences that Chokhmah governs.

names.name: Ab (Father)
names.description: Symbolic attribution to Chokhmah, referring to the archetypal masculine or paternal energy in the divine structure.
